de.uni.leipzig.asv.zitationsgraph.tests.data

Class GraphManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • de.uni.leipzig.asv.zitationsgraph.tests.data.GraphManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class GraphManager
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.beans.PropertyChangeListener
    This class class initialize the citationgraph with his node and edge table. The graph based on the extracted Publication and their Citations.
    It implement the PropertyChangeListener to get information, if the extraction part of the documents is ready
    Author:
    loco
